Name: Faint Light
Intro: Karenina: Scire gains an Anti-gravity Shield equal to 10% of max HP for each set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed when charging.

Name: Faint Light
Intro: Upon dealing damage, also inflicts Chain Fusion that reduces the target's Dark Resistance by 15% for 3s. When Karenina: Scire enters the charging status, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of red, blue, and yellow.

Name: Banishing Sunglow
Intro: Charging can consume one more set of 3-Ping Orbs. Upon the third 3-Ping, the Base DMG of the corresponding Leap Attack and Radiant Whirlwind will increase. Upon casting Starshatter Horizon, generates a Thermal Field, dealing Dark DMG once and inflicting Chain Fusion to targets entering the field for 10s.

Name: Banishing Sunglow
Intro: When in the Anti-gravity status, deals more Dark DMG. Upon dealing damage, reduces the target's Extra DMG Reduction by 5%. Press and hold Basic Attack to start charging and immediately activate QTEs that are not on cooldown. Radiant Whirlwind will spin faster.

Name: Unquenchable Willpower
Intro: On standby, Scire gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs when a teammate casts their Signature. (Each teammate triggers this once each time they are deployed.) Charging can consume an extra set of 3-Ping Orbs. Upon the 4th 3-Ping, Base DMG of the corresponding Leap Attack and Radiant Whirlwind will increase.

Name: Unquenchable Willpower
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Radiant Whirlwind Increases by 30%.

Name: Unquenchable Willpower
Intro: Starshatter Horizon gains 40% Extra DMG Bonus. Karenina: Scire will gain 3 Signal Orbs of a random color every time you switch to her.

Name: Clocking Up
Intro: Movement speed increases by 50% for 5s after dodging.

Name: Clocking Up
Intro: Upon entering battle, Gear Level starts at Lv.1 and ATK increases by 5%.

Name: The First Hope
Intro: Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs of a random color when switched in.

Name: The First Hope
Intro: Upon entering battle, Signal Orbs will be returned and rearranged into 3-Pings according to the number of existing orbs. Lightning DMG increases by 20% with each Gear Level. This effect stacks up to 3 times, and each lasts 8s. Triggering this effect again will refresh its duration.

Name: End of War
Intro: Lightning DMG of 3-Ping increases by 30%.

Name: End of War
Intro: Lightning DMG of Signature Move increases by 30%.

Name: End of War
Intro: Lightning DMG of Gear-Break Combo and Assault-Rising Combo increases by 30%.

Name: Severed Light
Intro: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.

Name: Severed Light
Intro: When activating Sword Form with more than half Afterglow Points, each hit of Basic Attack and Afterglow Shadow in Sword Form generates extra 2 stacks of Stigmata Will. Stigmata Will can stack up to 99 times. Casting Blade Abyss - Illuminated Abyss will trigger QTEs that are not in cooldown.

Name: Carved Darkness
Intro: Extra Signature Energy granted by Sword Dance and its Afterglow Shadow increases. When switched in, gains a random set of 3-Ping Orbs. Entering Sword Form generates 20 stacks of Stigmata Will instantly.

Name: Carved Darkness
Intro: Bright Candle records a DMG multiplier of the Orbs pinged and Glowing Lanternlight in Luminous Realm. When unleashed, an attack deals this multiplier of DMG to all units within range with 20 stacks of Stigmata Will created. Sword Dance deals an extra 2 hits (its first 2) before landing.

Name: Mass Decree
Intro: While in Staff Form, Signal Orb skills (including Core Passive - Glowing Lanternlight) gain 30% Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Mass Decree
Intro: While in Sword Form, Extra DMG Bonus of Basic Attack, Sword Dance, and Afterglow Shadow increases by 30%.

Name: Mass Decree
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Blade Abyss - Illuminated Abyss increases by 20%.

Name: Folded Memory
Intro: Gains a random set of 3-Ping when switched in.

Name: Folded Memory
Intro: Ice DMG increases by 20%. Casting Signature - Stringless Cage will activate all available QTEs.

Name: Transform Tracker
Intro: Gains 1 Signal Orb when entering the Solitary Dancer Form via a successful dodge. For every 1 stack of Pact of Memory, the Ice DMG of Signature - Stringless Cage increases by 8%.

Name: Transform Tracker
Intro: The Jete Points consumed every 0.1s during Strings On Me reduces by 50%. For every 1 stack of Pact of Memory, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 7%.

Name: Law of Sequence
Intro: Base DMG of 3-Ping increases by 80%.

Name: Law of Sequence
Intro: Base DMG of Core - Puppet Theater increases by 60%.

Name: Law of Sequence
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Stringless Cage increases by 20%.

Name: Realm Walk
Intro: Triggering Hypermatrix and casting Signature - End of Time will activate all available QTEs.

Name: Realm Walk
Intro: Deals 25% more Extra DMG in the Hypermatrix. Gains random 3-Ping Orbs upon entering the Hypermatrix for the first time. Casting Signature - Collapsing Realm will grant Signature Energy. Leaving the battlefield after casting the Signature will trigger Covering Fire.

Name: Hypermatrix Control
Intro: Gains 8 additional Signature Energy when performing Hypermatrix Strike and 1 Sight Point every time he enters Hypermatrix for the first time after being switched in.

Name: Hypermatrix Control
Intro: When casting Signature - Collapsing Realm, the Base DMG of Signature - End of Time increases by 15% for each Sight Point. When SS Rank Passive Skill - Realm Walk is active, casting Signature - Collapsing Realm will restore double Signature Energy instead.

Name: Knock on the Door
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Collapsing Realm increases by 30%.

Name: Knock on the Door
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping skills and Hypermatrix Strike increases by 20%.

Name: Knock on the Door
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - End of Time increases by 35%.

Name: Endless Creativity
Intro: Casting Signature - Color Rendering will activate all available QTEs.

Name: Endless Creativity
Intro: Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 20% when the Signature - Painter's Realm is expanded. Gains 30 Signature Energy and 1 "Backup Paint" every time upon entering the battlefield.

Name: Color Magic
Intro: Gains the extra buffs of Pure Color: Theme Emphasis and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts when casting either skill. Ice DMG Bonus of 3-Pings, Pure Color: Theme Emphasis, and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts increases by 10%.

Name: Color Magic
Intro: Increases the effects of Amplifier Class Skill by 100%. Increases the extra buffs of Pure Color: Theme Emphasis and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts to 15%.

Name: Masterpiece for the World
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Vibrant Brushstroke increases by 20%.

Name: Masterpiece for the World
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings, Pure Color: Theme Emphasis, and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts increases by 50%.

Name: Masterpiece for the World
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Finishing Touch increases by 50%.

Name: Drifting Vain
Intro: Casting Resolute Blow at full Blade Aura will also activate all available QTEs.

Name: Drifting Vain
Intro: Aphotic Point limit increases to 600. 3-Ping Skills and Resolute Blow gain 50 bonus Aphotic Points. Casting Signature - Weave: Splashing Thunder will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.

Name: Facets of Delusions
Intro: Upon entering battle, the first Resolute Blow cast will restore an addition of 20 Signature Energy. Base DMG of Signal Orb Skills and Resolute Blow increases by 50%.

Name: Facets of Delusions
Intro: While holding the odachi, 3-Pings will grant a 15% Extra DMG Bonus. The Base DMG of Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno and Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increase by 60% and 50% respectively. After entering the battlefield, Alpha's first Blading Radiance will enhance her swordwave.

Name: Glimpse Into All
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash and Resolute Blow increases by 30%.

Name: Glimpse Into All
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust and 3-Ping Skills increases by 50%.

Name: Glimpse Into All
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno increases by 50%.

Name: Night of Songs
Intro: CRIT Rate increases by 20%.

Name: Night of Songs
Intro: Gains 1 Dancer Point every time upon entering the battlefield. Base DMG Increase effect increases by 40% when there are 4 stacks of Emerald Flow.

Name: Gathering of Dragons
Intro: Successfully dodging with Choreography grants 3 Signal Orbs of a random color.

Name: Gathering of Dragons
Intro: The Physical DMG Bonus of Ultralimit Torque increases by 20%. ATK of other Kowloong Uniframes in the team increases by 30%.

Name: Dance of Dreams
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings increases by 20%.

Name: Dance of Dreams
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Poise of Emerald Flow increases by 50%.

Name: Dance of Dreams
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Vision of Mountains increases by 50%. When Kowloong Uniframes are under the effect of Hanying's Ultralimit Torque, they gain a random set of 3-Ping Orbs, CD: 4s. They also gain a shield equal to 50% of Hanying's ATK for 8s.

Name: Night Hunt
Intro: Casting Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash or unleashing Forest Predator's Deceleration Field will activate QTEs that are not on cooldown.

Name: Night Hunt
Intro: Gains 10 Signature Energy when casting Dusk Fluorescence. Each Critical Arclight point will increase Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Base DMG by 2% instead.

Name: Cocoon Break
Intro: After the Wolfspirit Release, each Growling Wolfspirit will consume double Wolfspirit Points, cause damage and healing of the same amount one more time, and make No. 21 gain Signature Energy and Critical Arclight 100% faster. Signal Orb Skills' Base DMG increases by 30%.

Name: Cocoon Break
Intro: Increases the effects of the Amplifier Class Skill by 100%. Each extra Signal Orb pinged in the Forest Predator Form will make No. 21 deal Lightning DMG 2 times through Dusk Fluorescence instead.

Name: Moonlit Howls
Intro: Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 20%.

Name: Moonlit Howls
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping skills and Wolfspirit Release increases by 30%.

Name: Moonlit Howls
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of Dusk Fluorescence and Forest Predator increases by 20%.

Name: Dynamic Impact
Intro: Activates all available QTEs when casting <color=#FF6347>Signature - Skull Crush</color>.

Name: Dynamic Impact
Intro: Lightning DMG increases by <color=#FF6347>30%</color>. Immediately gains 1 Signal Orb of the corresponding color after performing a 3-Ping.

Name: Firefall Synergy
Intro: Immediately converts the <color=#FF6347>Overload Orb</color> into a <color=#FF6347>Blast Orb</color> after performing a 3-Ping.

Name: Firefall Synergy
Intro: Each stack of <color=#FF6347>Engine Points</color> amplifies Base DMG of Skull Crush by <color=#FF6347>100%</color> instead. Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#FF6347>30%</color> in the <color=#FF6347>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Name: Outburst of Violence
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping Skills increases by <color=#FF6347>40%</color>.

Name: Outburst of Violence
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Thunderous Fury</color> and <color=#FF6347>Thunderclap Strike</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>40%</color>.

Name: Outburst of Violence
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Signature - Skull Crush</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>40%</color>.

Name: Decisive Omen
Intro: Casting <color=#FF6347>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color> and <color=#FF6347>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color> will activate all available QTEs.

Name: Decisive Omen
Intro: Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs when switched in. While <color=#FF6347>Judgment Zone</color> is active, Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#FF6347>30%</color>.

Name: Mark of Libra
Intro: When Echo is switched out, <color=#FF6347>Cecily</color> immediately gains 6 bonus <color=#FF6347>Cipher Orbs</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#FF6347>Cecily</color> gains <color=#FF6347>100%</color> Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Mark of Libra
Intro: The effect of Amplifier Class Skill increases by <color=#FF6347>100%</color>. Echo gains 30 <color=#FF6347>Splendor Points</color> and <color=#FF6347>Soul Shatter Mark</color> every time she enters the battlefield. <color=#FF6347>Soulbreaking Co-Strike's</color> Base DMG increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>.

Name: Dreamer's Shore
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Signature - Celestial Edge</color> increases by <color=#FF6347>30%</color>.

Name: Dreamer's Shore
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping skills and <color=#FF6347>Cipher Orb</color> skills increases by <color=#FF6347>50%</color>.

Name: Dreamer's Shore
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#FF6347>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color> and <color=#FF6347>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color> increase by <color=#FF6347>30%</color>.

Name: To Depart and Return
Intro: Consuming <color=#D91414>Primary Form Tidal Orbs</color> or casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Abyssal Currents</color> will activate all available QTEs.

Name: To Depart and Return
Intro: Gains one extra <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> each time upon entering battle. Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, and <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>15%</color> Extra DMG Bonus in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>.

Name: Dawnlight and Spume
Intro: Gains <color=#D91414>20</color> extra Signature Energy when pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb in Primary Form</color> for the first time after entering battle. Base DMG of Signal Orb skills and <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>'s Basic Attack bonus hits increases by <color=#D91414>30%</color>.

Name: Dawnlight and Spume
Intro: Gains one extra <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> each time upon entering battle. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb in Primary Form</color> grants <color=#D91414>10</color> additional Signature Energy. <color=#D91414>Signature - Raging Prelude</color> deals <color=#D91414>4500%</color> Dark DMG when the weather is <color=#D91414>Storm</color>. Maximum limit of <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color> increases to <color=#D91414>600</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, or 3-Ping Orb skills in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color> grants <color=#D91414>200%</color> more <color=#D91414>Abyssal Points</color>.

Name: Death and Rebirth
Intro: <color=#D91414>asic Attack - Abyssal Currents</color> has a <color=#D91414>20%</color> higher Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Death and Rebirth
Intro: <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orbs</color>, <color=#D91414>Riptide Orbs</color>, and 3-Ping Orb Skills have a <color=#D91414>40%</color> higher Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Death and Rebirth
Intro: <color=#D91414>Signature - Sunken Finale</color> gains an Extra DMG Bonus based on the pings in the <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, with each orb pinged granting a <color=#D91414>3%</color> bonus, up to <color=#D91414>16</color> orbs.

Name: Azure Flame
Intro: Casting Signature will activate all available QTEs.

Name: Azure Flame
Intro: Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414>25%</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Burst Drive</color> will rearrange all Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.

Name: Miraculous Star
Intro: When charging <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color>, performing a Red/Yellow 3-Ping can trigger <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Reflective Nebula</color>. Each Signal Orb pinged while charging will increase the Base DMG of the sword-pulling attack of this <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.  <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color> can consume the enhancement effect of <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Enhanced Blast</color> when pulling the sword out, increasing the Base DMG of the sword-pulling attack by <color=#D91414>100%</color>.

Name: Miraculous Star
Intro: Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Astral Edge</color>, <color=#D91414>Stellar Cross</color>, and <color=#D91414>Entangled Heart</color> increases by <color=#D91414>70%</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Cannon</color> also grants a random Signal Orb.

Name: Absolute Zero
Intro: Fire DMG of <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color>, <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Limit Removed</color>, and the sword-pulling attack of <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Skycrushing Blade</color> increases by <color=#D91414>30%</color>.

Name: Absolute Zero
Intro: ATK increases in <color=#D91414>Azure Form</color> by <color=#D91414>15%</color>.

Name: Absolute Zero
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus of <color=#D91414>Signature - Morning Star</color> and <color=#D91414>Entangled Heart</color> increases by <color=#D91414>20%</color>.
